akn:content.akn:p:
§ 106. Commandant defined In this title, the term “Commandant” means the Commandant of the Coast Guard. (Added Pub. L. 115–232, div. C, title XXXV, § 3531(a), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 2320, § 5; renumbered § 106, Pub. L. 115–282, title I, § 103(b), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4195.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsFor redesignation of prior sections 141 to 296 not listed below as having been previously repealed or renumbered, see Table Showing Redesignations Made by Title I of Pub.
